info.author: Author
info.noDocs: No documentation available for this plugin.

methods.name: Method Name
methods.noMethods: This plugin has no defined methods

methodDescriptions.tool: Tool for LLM use, can return any type, LLM can use return value for further processing
methodDescriptions.agent: For LLM interaction loop, must return string describing result, result is added to context and triggers another call
methodDescriptions.behavior: For LLM interaction loop, must return string describing result, result is added to context but DOES NOT trigger another call
methodDescriptions.multimodal_agent: For LLM interaction loop, returns multimodal message, result is added to context and triggers another call

webhook.name: Name
webhook.noEndpoints: No webhook endpoints defined for this plugin

dialogs.reloadMessage: Are you sure you want to reload plugin {{name}}? This will reinitialize the plugin.
dialogs.resetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all data for plugin {{name}}? This action cannot be undone!
dialogs.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete cloud plugin {{name}}?
dialogs.deleteDataWarning: Checking this option will delete all stored data for this plugin
dialogs.updateMessage: Are you sure you want to update cloud plugin {{name}} to the latest version? The plugin will be reloaded after update.
dialogs.updateSecurityWarning: Security Warning: Plugin updates may contain unreviewed code changes from the original author, including potentially malicious code or unsafe content. NekroAI community serves only as a plugin sharing platform and cannot be responsible for plugin content hosted on third-party platforms. Using any third-party plugins carries potential risks, please evaluate plugin security yourself.
dialogs.updateConfirmMessage: This action will update cloud plugin "{{name}}" to the latest version from the remote repository. The update may cause configuration changes, continue?
dialogs.deleteDataMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this data? This action cannot be undone!

messages.deleteWithDataSuccess: Cloud plugin {{name}} has been deleted (including data)
messages.updateSuccess: Cloud plugin {{name}} has been updated to the latest version!
messages.reloadFailed: Reload failed, please check backend logs
messages.updateFailed: Update failed, please check backend logs

welcome.title: Welcome to Plugin Management
welcome.hintMobile: Please click the button at bottom right to select a plugin to view details
welcome.hintDesktop: Please select a plugin from the left to view details

config.noConfig: This plugin has no configurable items

editor.pluginNameHelper: Can only contain lowercase letters, numbers and underscores, must start with a letter

validation.invalidName: Plugin name can only contain lowercase letters, numbers and underscores, must start with a letter

messages.loadFileFailed: Failed to load initial file content
messages.selectPluginFirst: Please select a plugin file first
messages.toggleSuccess: Plugin {{action}} successfully, please reload to apply changes

dialogs.resetMessage: Are you sure you want to discard current changes and restore to saved content?
dialogs.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete file {{file}}? This action cannot be undone!
dialogs.reloadMessage: Are you sure you want to reload the current plugin? This will reinitialize the plugin and apply code changes.
dialogs.toggleMessage: Are you sure you want to {{action}} the current plugin? Reload is required after {{action}}.
